FloatProp.name: Start upwards distance
FloatProp.doc: Sometimes drivelines are too low and will be under the actual mesh. This is a simple vertical offset added to each start positions to make sure that karts start on top of the track (and not under it). Generally the drivelines should be fixed, but this allows a quick solution for existing tracks.
